meanings.definition: Preventing or reducing the appearance of cellulite.
meanings.sent1: She used an anticellulite cream to help smooth her skin.
meanings.sent2: The anticellulite massage helped improve the texture of her thighs.
meanings.sent3: The anticellulite lotion worked like magic, making her legs look flawless.
meanings.sent4: Her anticellulite routine was like a shield against dimples on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The anticellulite treatment made her legs feel firmer and more toned.

meanings.definition: A product or treatment designed to combat cellulite.
meanings.sent1: She bought an anticellulite cream to use daily.
meanings.sent2: The anticellulite roller helped reduce the appearance of cellulite.
meanings.sent3: The anticellulite device buzzed like a little helper in her fight against dimples.
meanings.sent4: Her anticellulite purchase was a game-changer in her skincare routine.
meanings.sent5: The anticellulite treatment was her secret weapon for smoother skin.
